title: Edge of darkness. Pt. 1
brief_description: Into the Shadows - His investigation into his daughter’s murder reveals to Ronald Craven her involvement in nuclear power, politics, terrorism and death. Despite the agonies of his grief, Cravan finds himself drawn into Emma’s secret world. Rated: M
